abstract: Michael Alvarez, formerly of Intersport, joined the Telemundo Communications Group in a new post, vice president for New York advertising sales.
snippet: Michael Alvarez, formerly of Intersport, joined the Telemundo Communications Group in a new post, vice president for New York advertising sales.
lead_paragraph: Michael Alvarez joined the Telemundo Communications Group in a new post, vice president for New York advertising sales, handling duties that include serving as a sales lead for the Telemundo network sales New York office and managing a team of account managers for the New York region. He had been senior vice president for branded content and sponsorships at the New York office of Intersport. Telemundo is part of the NBC Universal unit of General Electric.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry
